info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 22 at 12:55PM CDT until August 23 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Big Sioux River at Watertown Broadway Avenue affecting Codington County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Big Sioux River at Watertown Broadway Avenue.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to just after midnight tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The lower banks on both sides of the river downstream of the gauge are overtopped, and the lower lying areas along Kampeska Blvd, 4th Ave SW, and Riverside Park on Kemp Ave begin to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:00 PM CDT Friday was 10.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to stall and then eventually fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 9.1 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 100 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT
